meanings.definition: Having a strong, rapid, or irregular heartbeat.
meanings.sent1: The palpitant kitten was so excited to see its owner.
meanings.sent2: The doctor listened to the palpitant heartbeat of the patient.
meanings.sent3: The palpitant drumming of the rain on the roof made me want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her palpitant anticipation before the big race was like a drumroll in her chest.
meanings.sent5: The palpitant sensation of fear gripped her as she entered the dark room.
